mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT q.question_id AS question_id, q.question_type AS question_type, q.question_content AS question_content, q.question_date AS question_date, q.product_id AS product_id, q.member_id AS member_id, q.answer_result AS answer_result, an.answer_id AS answer_id, an.answer_contexts AS answer_contexts, an.answer_date AS answer_date, an.member_id AS ans_member_id FROM question q LEFT JOIN question_answer an ON q.question_id = an.question_id ORDER BY q.question_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
